verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: boasted] [ARG1: about his polling numbers] [ARGM-TMP: during a speech at the the National Rifle Association 's annual conference] , [ARGM-ADV: telling those in the audience that rapper Kanye West helped double his approval in the black community] .
